Attack_a.NAME: Attack-I
Attack_a.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Showtime NL (Has special effect based on the Melee Weapon equipped.)
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! True Damage. NL Gain !M! Showtime. NL Apply !M! Dimension Fissure.
Melee NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 2 Showtime.
Melee NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Showtime. NL Gain !M! Flex.
Melee NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Showtime. NL Apply 2 Endless Swords to you and your enemy.

Attack_b.NAME: Attack-II
Attack_b.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL deal !D! damage to  all enemies. NL gain !M! Showtime. NL (Has special effect based on the Melee Weapon equipped.)
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! True Damage to all enemies. NL Gain !M! Showtime. NL Apply 3 Dimension Fissure.
Melee NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Gain 4 Showtime.
Melee NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Gain 3 Showtime.
Melee NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Gain !M! Showtime. NL Gain 2 Flex. NL Apply 1 Vulnerable.
Melee NL deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Gain !M! Showtime. NL Apply 2 Endless Swords to you and your enemy.

Provocation.NAME: Provocation
Provocation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Showtime. NL Draw 1 card. NL Gain 1 Vulnerable.

Shoot.NAME: Shoot
Shoot.DESCRIPTION: Firearms NL Deal 6 Fixed Damage. NL (Has special effect based on the Firearm Weapon equipped.)
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Firearms NL Deal 6 Fixed Damage. NL Deal the same damage to random 1 or 2 other enemies. NL Gain 1 Showtime.
Firearms NL Deal 6 Fixed Damage twice.

Airhike.NAME: Air Hike
Airhike.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL Put a skill card from your discard pile into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: No skill card in the discard pile!

BeastUppercut.NAME: Beast Uppercut
BeastUppercut.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain 2 Flex. NL Gain !M! Showtime.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain #r2 Showtime. NL Deal double damage when using #yGilgamesh.

Chargeshoot.NAME: Charge Shoot-I
Chargeshoot.DESCRIPTION: Firearms NL Deal 9 Fixed Damage. NL Deal an additional 3 damage for each stack of Showtime you have.

Chargeshoot2.NAME: Charge Shoot-II
Chargeshoot2.DESCRIPTION: Firearms NL Deal 5-9 Fixed Damage to all enemies. NL Deal additional 2 damage for each stack of Showtime you have.

Dash1.NAME: Jump Cancel
Dash1.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL then draw that many cards.
Dash1.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL then draw that many cards and 1 more.

Doubleshoot.NAME: Twosome Time
Doubleshoot.DESCRIPTION: Firearms NL Deal 3 Fixed Damage to a random enemy 3 times. NL attack 1 more time for every 2 stacks of Showtime you have.

EbonyIvory.NAME: Ebony&Ivory
EbonyIvory.DESCRIPTION: Weapon NL Improves firearms attack cards. NL Gains special effect when you have Gunslinger style active.

Fullhouse.NAME: Full House
Fullhouse.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 Showtime. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Add an Air Hike to your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain Flex for every stack of Showtime you have when using #yGilgamesh.

GilgameshcomboA.NAME: Gilgamesh Combo A
GilgameshcomboA.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Showtime. NL Deal !D! damage twice.
GilgameshcomboA.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Showtime. NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Gain 2 Showtime.

Hightime.NAME: High Time
Hightime.DESCRIPTION: Put 1 attack card from draw pile into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: No attack cards in draw pile.

Kick13.NAME: Kick 13
Kick13.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 Showtime. NL Deal !D! damage 8 times. NL Gain !M! Showtime. NL Exhaust.

LucifercomboA.NAME: Lucifer Combo A
LucifercomboA.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage twice. NL Apply 2 Endless Swords to you and your enemy.
LucifercomboA.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage two times. NL Apply 3 Endless Swords to you. NL Apply 2 Endless Swords to your enemy.

LucifercomboB.NAME: Lucifer Combo B
LucifercomboB.DESCRIPTION: Melee. NL Deal !D! damage. NL apply 2 Endless Swords to you. NL and apply 3 Endless Swords to your enemy.
LucifercomboB.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 3 Endless Swords to you. NL Apply 4 Endless Swords to your enemy.

LucifercomboC.NAME: Lucifer Combo C
LucifercomboC.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 1 Endless Sword for every stack of Showtime you have.
LucifercomboC.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 1 Endless Sword for every stack of Showtime you have to you and your enemy.

Millionkick.NAME: Million Kick
Millionkick.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 Showtime. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 6 times. NL Gain !M! Showtime. NL Exhaust.

Millionstab.NAME: Million Stab
Millionstab.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage two times. NL Gain !M! Showtime.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Attack #r1 more times for every #b3 stacks of Showtime you have when using #yRebellion.

Rebellion.NAME: Rebellion
Rebellion.DESCRIPTION: Weapon NL Improves related cards. NL Million Stab deals 2 more damage. NL Gain special effect when you have Swordmaster style active.
Rebellion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Weapon NL Improves related cards. NL Million Stab deals 2 more damage. NL Gain special effect when you have Swordmaster style active. NL Gain 2 strength.

Redorb.NAME: Red Orb
Redorb.DESCRIPTION: Mark 1 enemy. NL Gain 1-50 coins after killing the target. NL Exhaust.
Redorb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Mark 1 enemy. NL Gain 1-50 coins after killing the target.

Straight.NAME: Straight
Straight.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Showtime.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain #r1 Flex. NL Deal double damage when using #yGilgamesh.

VitalstarS.NAME: Vital Star-S
VitalstarS.DESCRIPTION: Lose 15 coins. NL Heal 3 HP. NL Exhaust.

Weaponchange.NAME: Weapon Switching
Weaponchange.DESCRIPTION: Put a power card from your draw pile into your hand，it cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust
Weaponchange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Put a power card from your draw pile into your hand，it cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: No power card in draw pile!

Weaponupgrade.NAME: Skill Allocation
Weaponupgrade.DESCRIPTION: Lose 10 coins. NL Upgrade a card in your hand for the rest of the combat.

Airtrick.NAME: Air Trick
Airtrick.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Gain Showtime equal to the number of cards you discard plus 1. NL Exhaust.
Airtrick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Gain Showtime equal to the number of cards you discard plus 2. NL Exhaust.

Blueorb.NAME: Blue Orb
Blueorb.DESCRIPTION: Lose 100 coins. NL Raise your max HP by 10. NL Exhaust.

Darkslayer.NAME: Dark Slayer
Darkslayer.DESCRIPTION: Style NL Add 1 Yamato into your hand. NL It cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.
Darkslayer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Style NL Add 1 Yamato into your hand. NL It cost 0 this turn.

Demonreform.NAME: Devil Trigger
Demonreform.DESCRIPTION: Gain Devil Trigger for !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

DevilstarL.NAME: Devil Star-L
DevilstarL.DESCRIPTION: Lose 60 coins. NL Gain 6 Showtime. NL Exhaust.

Enemystep.NAME: Mustang
Enemystep.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, it loses 10 strength for 1 turn.
Enemystep.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: If the enemy intends to attack, it loses 10 strength for 1 turn. NL You gain 2 Flex.

Goldorb.NAME: Gold Orb
Goldorb.DESCRIPTION: Lose 300 coins. NL When you would die, heal to 50% of your Max HP instead (works once). NL Exhaust.

Purpleorb.NAME: Purple Orb
Purpleorb.DESCRIPTION: Lose 150 coins. NL Gain 1 Showtime at the start of your turn for this run, up to 4. NL Gain 4 Showtime. NL Exhaust.

Royalguard.NAME: Royal Guard
Royalguard.DESCRIPTION: Style NL Gain RoyalGuard for 1 turn.
Royalguard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Style NL Gain RoyalGuard for 1 turn. NL Add 1 Dreadnaught to your hand.

Splesh.NAME: Splesh
Splesh.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Lose 4 Endless Swords and all Showtime. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Exhaust.
Splesh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Lose 4 Endless Swords and all Showtime. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Apply Endless Swords equal to #r3 times of Showtime you have when using #yLucifer.

Stylechange.NAME: Style Switch
Stylechange.DESCRIPTION: Add a random StyleCard into your hand. NL it costs 0 this turn.
Stylechange.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Add a random Style Card to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Put 1 card from your draw pile into your hand.

Swordcombo.NAME: Dance Macaber
Swordcombo.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal !D! damage 5 times. NL Gain !M! Showtime.

Trickster.NAME: Trickster
Trickster.DESCRIPTION: Style. NL Choose two cards in your hand. NL They cost 0 until played. NL Add 1 SkyStar to your hand.

VitalstarL.NAME: Vital Star-L
VitalstarL.DESCRIPTION: Lose 50 coins. NL Heal 20 HP. NL Exhaust.

Weaponreturn.NAME: Weapon Return
Weaponreturn.DESCRIPTION: When a Weapon is removed from play, add the same unupgraded weapon card to your draw pile (excluding Yamato). NL Exhaust.
Weaponreturn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: When a Weapon is removed from play, add the same upgraded weapon card to your draw pile (excluding Yamato). NL Exhaust.

Airhike2.NAME: Air Hike
Airhike2.DESCRIPTION: Put a card from your hand on top of your draw pile. NL Put a skill card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: No skill card in my discard pile!

Climax.NAME: Climax
Climax.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Endless Swords NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy for every stack of Endless Swords. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

Dreadnaught.NAME: Dreadnaught
Dreadnaught.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Rage. NL Gain 9 Block for every stack of Rage. NL Exhaust.

Fireworks.NAME: Fireworks
Fireworks.DESCRIPTION: Firearms NL Deal 10-20 Fixed Damage to all enemies 4 times. NL Gain !M! Showtime. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

PF013.NAME: PF013:Epidemic
PF013.DESCRIPTION: Firearms NL Deal 6 Fixed Damage twice. NL Gain !Calamity!. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

PF262.NAME: PF262:Jealousy
PF262.DESCRIPTION: Firearms NL Deal 3 Fixed Damage to a random enemy for every stack of Showtime you have. NL Gain 2 Calamity. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

PF398.NAME: PF398:Revenge
PF398.DESCRIPTION: Firearms NL Lose 3 Calamity. NL Deal Fixed Damage equal to 4 times of Showtime you have to all the enemies. NL Apply 3 Weak to all enemies. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

PF594.NAME: PF594:Argument
PF594.DESCRIPTION: Firearms NL Lose 5 Calamity. NL Deal 9 Fixed Damage to all enemies 4 times. NL Attack one more time for every stack of Showtime you have. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

PF666.NAME: PF666:Omen
PF666.DESCRIPTION: Firearms NL Lose all Calamity. NL Remove Block from all enemies. NL Stun the enemy for one turn. NL Deal Fixed Damage equal to 3 times of Showtime you have. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

PINUP.NAME: PIN-UP
PINUP.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Endless Swords for every stack of Showtime on you. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

Rainstorm.NAME: Rain Storm
Rainstorm.DESCRIPTION: Firearms NL Deal 5 Fixed Damage to a random enemy 3 times for every stack of Showtime on you. NL Gain 2 Showtime. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

Rebellionsword.NAME: Over Drive
Rebellionsword.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Deal 3 damage to all enemies for every stack of Showtime on you. NL Gain !M! Showtime. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

Release.NAME: Release
Release.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Rage. NL Deal damage equal to 3 times your Block. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal #r30% max HP instead when you lose 3 or more Rage.

Risingdragon.NAME: Real Impact
Risingdragon.DESCRIPTION: Can be triggered only when you have Demon Reform on you. NL Lose all Showtime. NL Deal damage equal to 18 times of stacks of Showtime you lose. NL Strength affects this card 10 times. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

Royalrelease.NAME: Royal Release
Royalrelease.DESCRIPTION: Lose all Rage. NL Deal damage equal to 5 times your Block. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Deal #r50% max HP instead when you lose 6 or more Rage.

Sheathing.NAME: Sheathing
Sheathing.DESCRIPTION: Remove all Dimension Fissure. NL Deal 3 True Damage for every stack removed. NL Gain [R] for every 3 stacks. NL Gain 1 Showtime. NL Exhaust.

Skystar.NAME: Sky Star
Skystar.DESCRIPTION: Gain SkyStar for 1 turn. NL Exhaust.

Slashdimension1.NAME: Slash Dimension F
Slashdimension1.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! True Damage 3 times to all enemies. NL Apply 3 Vulnerable, 3 DimensionFissure. NL Gain 1 Showtime. NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

CoyoteA.DESCRIPTION: Weapon NL Improves firearms attack cards. NL Gains special effect when you have Gunslinger style active.
CoyoteA.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Weapon NL Improves firearms attack cards. NL Gains special effect when you have Gunslinger style active. NL Innate.

DevilstarS.NAME: Devil Star-S
DevilstarS.DESCRIPTION: Lose 40 coins. NL Gain 3 Showtime. NL Exhaust.

DT.NAME: DevilTrigger Shortly

Ecstasy.NAME: Ecstasy

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The enemy did not have Endless Swords.

Gilgamesh.NAME: Gilgamesh
Gilgamesh.DESCRIPTION: Weapon NL Improves related cards. NL Gain special effect when you have Swordmaster style active.

Greenorb.NAME: Green Orb
Greenorb.DESCRIPTION: Mark 1 enemy. NL heal 1-10 HP after killing the target. NL Exhaust.
Greenorb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Mark 1 enemy. NL heal 1-10 HP after killing the target.

Gunslinger.NAME: Gunslinger
Gunslinger.DESCRIPTION: Style NL All Firearms attack cards that are not colorless cost 0 this turn. NL Gain 1 Showtime and 1 Calamity for every Firearms attack card you play.

Gunstinger.NAME: Gun Stinger
Gunstinger.DESCRIPTION: Firearms NL Deal 10-20 Fixed Damage that ignores Block.

Holywater.NAME: Holy Water

Honeycombofire.NAME: Honeycombo Fire

Honeycombofire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: There is 20% chance that your Firearms attack cards will be played twice this turn.

Lucifer.NAME: Lucifer

Lucifer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Weapon NL When card related to Endless Swords is played, gain 1 Showtime. NL Gain special effect when you have Swordmaster style active.

LucifercomboD.NAME: Lucifer Combo D
LucifercomboD.DESCRIPTION: Melee NL Remove all Endless Swords. NL Deal damage equal to !D! for each stack removed.

Pandora.NAME: Pandora
Pandora.DESCRIPTION: Weapon NL Improves firearms attack cards. NL Add 1 random colorless Firearms attack card into your hand at the start of every turn. NL Gains special effect when you have Gunslinger style active.
Pandora.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Weapon NL Improves firearms attack cards. NL Add 2 random colorless Firearms attack card into your hand at the start of every turn. NL Gains special effect when you have Gunslinger style active.

Royaldefend.NAME: Royal Block
Royaldefend.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Rage. NL Exhaust.

Shock.NAME: Shock
Shock.DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 Showtime. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Apply 2 Vulnerable to all enemies. NL 30% chance to stun all enemies.
Shock.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 2 Showtime. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Apply 2 Vulnerable to all enemies. NL 30% chance to stun all enemies. NL Gain 1 Showtime.

SSScard.NAME: SmokinSickStyle!!!
SSScard.DESCRIPTION: Gain Showtime equal to the number of attack cards played this turn. NL Exhaust. NL (Gain !M! Showtime now).
SSScard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Showtime equal to the number of attack cards played plus 1. NL Exhaust. NL (Gain !M! Showtime now).

Stinger.NAME: Stinger

EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: The Million Stab costs 0 this turn when using #yRebellion.

Swordmaster.NAME: Sword Master

Unrisingdragon.NAME: Rising Dragon
Unrisingdragon.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 6 times the number of stacks of Showtime you have.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Lose at least #b2 Show Time. NL Strength affects this card 5 times. NL Deal double damage while using #yGilgamesh.

VitalstarM.NAME: Vital Star-M
VitalstarM.DESCRIPTION: Spend 30 coins. NL Heal 10 HP. NL Exhaust
